title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.34 - When permits take effect
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.34 - When permits take effect

State Regulations

No permit or any renewal thereof shall become
effective, nor shall any use be made or any privilege enjoyed thereunder, until
the acceptance of the permit shall have been duly executed, and all fees and
charges prescribed and required by this Part have been paid to the board or its
duly authorized representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
